labels.text: This is one segment of a five-part film that alludes to the Chinese legend ‘Seven Sages of the Bamboo Grove’. The story refers to seven young poets and writers from the Wei and Jin Dynasty who escape to the idealised world of a bamboo forest. Yang casts young urbanites and places them in a lush forest landscape where they are caught between the fantasy and the reality of their existence.

此為以傳統中國故事「竹林七賢」為主題的五部曲錄像的其中一部。該作品重構了魏晉時期七位年輕名士從俗世逃離到竹林中理想世界的故事。楊福東鏡頭下的都市青年置身於一片茂密的叢林風景中，在理想與現實的夾縫間遊走。

images.AltText: Monochrome still from a video installation. Five men in suits and two stylish women gather on a cobblestone trail in a forest park, as if posing for a fashion photographer.
images.AltTextTC: 擷取自錄像裝置的黑白畫面中，五個穿着西裝的男人和兩個打扮時尚的女人，聚集在森林公園的鵝卵石小徑上，彷彿正在擺姿勢拍攝時裝照。
